Title: Login process - happy path
Description: Testing happy path of login process.
ExpectedResult: User should be successfully logged in to QA Sandbox. User should land to dashboard page.

Title: Enter invalid password in 'Password' field.
Description: Testing login process when user enters invalid password in 'Password' field.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Password incorrect' validation message should popup bellow 'Password' field.

Title: Enter 'stefanrasevic@gmail.net' in 'Email' field.
Description: Testing login process when user enters 'stefanrasevic@gmail.net' in Email field.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'User not found' validation message should popup bellow Email field.

Title: Enter 'stefanrasevic@gmail' in 'Email' field.
Description: Testing login process when user enters 'stefanrasevic@gmail' in Email field.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Email is invalid' validation message should popup bellow Email field.

Title: Enter 'stefanrasevic@' in 'Email' field.
Description: Testing login process when user enters 'stefanrasevic@' in Email field.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Please enter a part following '@', stefanrasevic@ is incomplete.' validation message should popup bellow Email field.

Title: Enter 'stefanrasevic' in 'Email' field.
Description: Testing login process when user enters 'stefanrasevic' in Email field.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Please include an '@' in the email address. stefanrasevic is missing an '@'.' validation message should popup bellow Email field.

Title: Leave password field blank
Description: Testing login process when password field is left blank.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Password is required' validation message should popup bellow Password field.

Title: Email field is blank
Description: Testing login process when email field is left blank.
ExpectedResult: User should be on login page. 'Email field is required' validation message should popup bellow Email field.
